definition: abbr. for Ukraine 烏克蘭|乌克兰[Wu1 ke4 lan2]/surname Wu
prop/support (for weight)/rest (e.g. arm rest)/thanks to/to hold in one's hand/to support in one's palm/to give/to base/to commit/to set/torr (unit of pressure)
to trust/to entrust/to be entrusted with/to act as trustee

sentences.english: This Utopian dream is far beyond the range of possibility.
sentences.chinese: 这种乌托邦式的梦想根本不可能实现。

sentences.english: The Green Book was an exercise, if a daft one, in utopian totalitarianism.
sentences.chinese: 绿皮书就是乌托邦式的极权主义的拙劣预演。

sentences.english: Every kind of Utopian conception is the responses of ideologist to the political reality.
sentences.chinese: 每一种乌托邦观念都是思想家对当时政治现实的回应。

sentences.english: Bloch's utopian philosophy has a strong charactor of religion.
sentences.chinese: 布洛赫的乌托邦哲学具有很强的宗教色彩。

sentences.english: This small fraction would do what the Utopians were not capable of doing.
sentences.chinese: 这一小群可以做到乌托邦无法做到的。

sentences.english: In ancient China, all the Utopias were completely agricultural ones.
sentences.chinese: 中国古代的理想国都是纯粹的农业乌托邦。

sentences.english: The effectual truth of the matter, not the imagination of it or the utopia of it.
sentences.chinese: 事务的有力事实面，而非妄想或乌托邦。

sentences.english: Second, there has been a loss of utopian élan.
sentences.chinese: 第二是对于乌托邦的热情的丧失。

sentences.english: I had no convenient cicerone in the pattern of the Utopian books.
sentences.chinese: 我在乌托邦的书里没有找到现成模式的指导思想。

sentences.english: Fan Ben body-theology that is absolutely anti-utopia.
sentences.chinese: 反本体论神学即反绝对乌托邦。

sentences.english: It is a kind of extreme.
But what kind of a utopia is it which is kept by force?
sentences.chinese: 但这是那门子的乌托邦，要靠武力维持？

sentences.english: Surely, Eutopia needs to have the consummate character , ideal but needs not.
sentences.chinese: 乌托邦必然要有完美的性质，理想却不必。

sentences.english: The hybrid child of a murderous utopia and a disenchanted époque.
sentences.chinese: 血腥凶残的乌托邦和幻灭的时代产下了混血儿。

sentences.english: Those she calls “techno-Utopians” have said, “This is fantastic!”
sentences.chinese: 那些被她称为“技术乌托邦者”则说“那太美妙了”。

sentences.english: Part of it was done by those in power - politicians, financiers and technological utopians.
sentences.chinese: 一部分是由那些掌权的政治家，金融家和技术乌托邦。

definition: Brave New World, novel by Aldous Huxley 阿道司·赫胥黎[A1 dao4 si1 · He4 xu1 li2]
